com.pelletier.valuelist.adapter.filesystem

Class DefaultFileSystemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pelletier.valuelist.adapter.filesystem.DefaultFileSystemAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataAdapter<List<File>>

    public class DefaultFileSystemAdapter
extends Object
implements DataAdapter<List<File>>
    Simple file system adapter for directory listings. This class was built as an example of the flexibility of adapters. Sorting by date or name, and filtering by name are supported.
    Author:
    Ryan Pelletier

      • query

        public Values<List<File>> query(Map<String,Object> params,
                       PagingInfo pagingInfo)
        Specified by:
        query in interface DataAdapter<List<File>>
        Parameters:
        params - User must supply param "path" with String of path to list Files from, this is appended to optionally configured baseDirectory to load the actual files.
        pagingInfo - Requested paging.
        Returns:
        Return Values, which wraps List and PagingInfo
